mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, title, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.updated_at, u.nickname FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.title, p.content, p.view_count, p.created_at, p.updated_at, u.nickname FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId}
UPDATE post SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE post_id = #{postId}
